questions.question: A flat plate of steel (k = 54 w/m-k) 1.32cm thick, 12cm wide and 1m high generates heat at the rate of 7029kw/m3. The temperature of the left end surface is 80 C and on right end is 98 C. Find the value of maximum temperature in the slab.
In the above question find the heat flow from each surface.

answers.a: Left Surface heat flow is -12528.64 w and right surface heat flow is 934824.23 w
answers.b: Left Surface heat flow is -14403.33 w and right surface heat flow is 1098990.26 w
answers.c: Left Surface heat flow is -23208.12 w and right surface heat flow is 1093242.26 w
answers.d: Left Surface heat flow is -12230.93 w and right surface heat flow is 2092890.92 w
